message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. Let me know if that sounds good to you!
I'm really interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I understand that $10000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $14000. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $14000 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
